episode of.title: The Dimes and Nichols Show (TV Series 2016–2017)

imdb.plot outline: Dimes and Nichols had his whole life together. A thriving show on the announcements, a beautiful wife, and a football field length trophy case to contain all of his awards. However it all comes crashing down when he is barred from his own show, due to financial woes and some new up and comers taking his place. Dimes slowly begins his decent into depression and insanity once this occurs, being diagnosed with multiple personality disorder and taking a liking to the booze. His life seems all but pointless until the fresh faced Lucas Freeman comes into his life and teaches how to put down the bottle, and pick back up the microphone. Realizing how to take his show back, Dimes adapts his humor to a generation that has slipped through his fingers, but with the help of Lucas and homeless man Alex Fisch, Dimes begins to re-create his show for a more modern age. His show begins to thrive once more as he addresses issues such as money laundering, politics, and drugs. Dimes finishes his run on top with a record breaking viewed episode "High School Investigation Part One". After that he quietly retires leaving a trail of inspired creators, and himself a new outlook on life.
imdb.title: The Dimes and Nichols Show
akas: The Dimes and Nichols Show (United States)
plot: Chronicles the life and misadventures of the misanthropic Dimes and Nichols as he attempts to create the greatest show of all time, while battling a multiple personality disorder and college life.

Dimes and Nichols had his whole life together. A thriving show on the announcements, a beautiful wife, and a football field length trophy case to contain all of his awards. However it all comes crashing down when he is barred from his own show, due to financial woes and some new up and comers taking his place. Dimes slowly begins his decent into depression and insanity once this occurs, being diagnosed with multiple personality disorder and taking a liking to the booze. His life seems all but pointless until the fresh faced Lucas Freeman comes into his life and teaches how to put down the bottle, and pick back up the microphone. Realizing how to take his show back, Dimes adapts his humor to a generation that has slipped through his fingers, but with the help of Lucas and homeless man Alex Fisch, Dimes begins to re-create his show for a more modern age. His show begins to thrive once more as he addresses issues such as money laundering, politics, and drugs. Dimes finishes his run on top with a record breaking viewed episode "High School Investigation Part One". After that he quietly retires leaving a trail of inspired creators, and himself a new outlook on life.
